divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving on Hwy 60 to twin cities near St.James mn was talking to wife and when i looked up in the sky i saw a brite object that looked like a brite star it was very cloudey and rainey that day the object was about mid level with the clouds and then it disapered when it disapered it was like the object got smaller and smaller in the ski like it was pulled back i guess when i saw it i was in ahh i told my wife i saw and she said why didint you tell me i said it was to quick about a mile or to later we stopped at a rest stop i felt no feelings just that was cool to have seen such a thing this something i mite wont to study or join mufon to study such objects i live near south dakota wich has no mufon chapter.
trends: There have been no other sightings in St James
This sighting has never been favorited.
